00026  * Efficient memory allocation for lots of similar small chunks.
00027  */
00028 
00033 #include "MEM_guardedalloc.h"
00034 
00035 #include "BLI_memarena.h"
00036 #include "BLI_linklist.h"
00037 
00038 struct MemArena {
00039     unsigned char *curbuf;
00040     int bufsize, cursize;
00041     const char *name;
00042 
00043     int use_calloc;
00044     int align;
00045 
00046     LinkNode *bufs;
00047 };
00048 
00049 MemArena *BLI_memarena_new(int bufsize, const char *name)
00050 {
00051     MemArena *ma = MEM_callocN(sizeof(*ma), "memarena");
00052     ma->bufsize = bufsize;
00053     ma->align = 8;
00054     ma->name = name;
00055 
00056     return ma;
00057 }
00058 
00059 void BLI_memarena_use_calloc(MemArena *ma)
00060 {
00061     ma->use_calloc = 1;
00062 }
00063 
00064 void BLI_memarena_use_malloc(MemArena *ma)
00065 {
00066     ma->use_calloc = 0;
00067 }
00068 
00069 void BLI_memarena_use_align(struct MemArena *ma, int align)
00070 {
00071     /* align should be a power of two */
00072     ma->align = align;
00073 }
00074 
00075 void BLI_memarena_free(MemArena *ma)
00076 {
00077     BLI_linklist_free(ma->bufs, (void(*)(void *))MEM_freeN);
00078     MEM_freeN(ma);
00079 }
00080 
00081 /* amt must be power of two */
00082 #define PADUP(num, amt) ((num + (amt - 1)) &~ (amt-1))
00083 
00084 void *BLI_memarena_alloc(MemArena *ma, int size)
00085 {
00086     void *ptr;
00087 
00088     /* ensure proper alignment by rounding
00089      * size up to multiple of 8 */
00090     size = PADUP(size, ma->align);
00091 
00092     if (size > ma->cursize) {
00093         unsigned char *tmp;
00094 
00095         if (size > ma->bufsize - (ma->align - 1)) {
00096             ma->cursize = PADUP(size+1, ma->align);
00097         }
00098         else
00099             ma->cursize = ma->bufsize;
00100 
00101         if (ma->use_calloc)
00102             ma->curbuf = MEM_callocN(ma->cursize, ma->name);
00103         else
00104             ma->curbuf = MEM_mallocN(ma->cursize, ma->name);
00105 
00106         BLI_linklist_prepend(&ma->bufs, ma->curbuf);
00107 
00108         /* align alloc'ed memory (needed if align > 8) */
00109         tmp = (unsigned char*)PADUP( (intptr_t) ma->curbuf, ma->align);
00110         ma->cursize -= (tmp - ma->curbuf);
00111         ma->curbuf = tmp;
00112     }
00113 
00114     ptr = ma->curbuf;
00115     ma->curbuf += size;
00116     ma->cursize -= size;
00117 
00118     return ptr;
00119 }
